title: Fix failing tests on !windows
body:
Switching to `Microsoft.Net.Sdk` tooling is causing some tests to fail on !windows. I included this PR's link as comments next to the failing tests.

Commits that disable failing tests:
- https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/pull/2868/commits/13e320f04234c0f33a9ccc73e683681e655d786f
- https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/pull/2868/commits/fa504040bef1f3d41751f2379276b0fbb1399caf
- https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/pull/2868/commits/86c67d8ebd00b3b6a57013b69082f04214fe155d
